findings.message:
Log (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#62-86) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- History.push(LastMsg) (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#83)
findings.name: controlled-array-length

findings.message:
Reentrancy in W_WALLET.Collect(uint256) (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#21-35):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#29)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- acc.balance -= _am (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#31)
	W_WALLET.Acc (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#50) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- W_WALLET.Acc (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#50)
	- W_WALLET.Collect(uint256) (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#21-35)
	- W_WALLET.Put(uint256) (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#11-19)
findings.name: reentrancy-eth

findings.message:
W_WALLET.Put(uint256) (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#11-19) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _unlockTime > now (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#17)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
W_WALLET.Collect(uint256) (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#21-35) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- acc.balance >= MinSum && acc.balance >= _am && now > acc.unlockTime (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#26)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.25 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.25 (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#7)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Low level call in W_WALLET.Collect(uint256) (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#21-35):
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x7b368c4e805c3870b6c49a3f1f49f69af8662cf3.sol#29)
findings.name: low-level-calls
